item.title: [pi] Dumb question, fast answer? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“veng”)) {
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 300000)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 300000);
c.getItems().addItem(9075, 1000);
c.getItems().addItem(560, 1000);
c.getItems().addItem(557, 1000);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“you need 300k To Buy Veng Runes”);
return;
}
